short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays web page content in bite sized chunks. Developed for those suffering from anxiety and attention disorders

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays web page content in bite sized chunks. Developed for greater accessibility for those suffering from anxiety and attention disorders. To activate it just click "Add to Chrome" and then you should see a black tooth appear to the right of your search bar. Click on the black tooth to activate "Bite Sized" and the tooth should turn white. Click it again to disable it.
